trans-unit.source: Represents a proposed change to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> within a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示的建议的更改<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>正在运行的工作流实例中。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is the base class for the canonical change actions which are added and removed and may be performed on a collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]此类是添加和删除时的规范更改操作的基类，并可以在集合上执行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref> class, initializing the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityChangeAction"></xref>类，同时初始化关联<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: compositeActivity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: compositeActivity为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the OwnerActivityDottedPath of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置的 OwnerActivityDottedPath <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref>与此实例关联。

trans-unit.source: This manipulates the OwnerActivityDottedPath member of the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 这将操作关联的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> OwnerActivityDottedPath 成员

trans-unit.source: Therefore, trying to set this without first initializing the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 因此，尝试设置此而无需首先初始化关联<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>将导致异常引发。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The OwnerActivityDottedPath of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> associated with this instance.
Validates the changes pending on the target activity.
trans-unit.target: 验证在目标活动上挂起的更改。

trans-unit.source: If `contextActivity` cannot be safely cast to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`contextActivity`无法安全地转换为<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>返回空引用。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The activity to have its changes validated.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> that contains any <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref> resulting from running each <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref> defined for the target activity.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref>包含任何<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError"></xref>导致运行每<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.Validator"></xref>为目标活动定义。

trans-unit.source: contextActivity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: contextActivity为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。
